price: Dize: "Quiçá algo do que apressais se vos aproxime."
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
